title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes
body: Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes         Blue damselfly NPS photo  Some insects can be nuisances, but the variety of colorful butterflies, dragonflies and damselflies only adds to your visit to the scenic river. Throughout its length, the Niobrara supports over 75 species of dragonflies and damselflies, as well as nearly twice that number of butterfly species.
